meanings.definition: Friendly relations between nations or groups.
meanings.sent1: The amity between the two countries led to a successful trade agreement.
meanings.sent2: The amity among the classmates made the school environment pleasant.
meanings.sent3: The amity between the cats and dogs in the neighborhood was quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: The amity between the colors on the canvas created a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The amity in the air during the festival was palpable and heartwarming.
